channel.title: Racing wheel freezes game?
channel.description: Well, a while ago I bought a racing wheel (genius speed wheel 3 vibration). I use it with gtr2 on Vista. When I use it, the game randomly freezes for a few seconds. It has nothing to do with the video settings, because when I use the keyboard it doesn't freeze. So it has to be the wheel, but do you guys have any ideas what's wrong with it and how to fix it?

item.title: Racing wheel freezes game?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Maybe update the drivers for the wheel?

Read full topic
